transcript: Out there, some places is a huge mass of silverfish heading this way. They don't know why, we don't know why, it wasn't a decision, they didn't take a vote. No one sent them an invitation or a map.

segments.text: Out there, some places is a huge mass of silverfish heading this way.
They don't know why, we don't know why, it wasn't a decision, they didn't take a vote.
No one sent them an invitation or a map.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Out there someplace is this huge mass of silver fish heading this way.  They don't know why.  We don't know why.  It wasn't a decision.  They didn't take a vote.  No one sent them an invitation or a map;
